sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Mawk-&mawk-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout:
chmod from the fileutils package cp from the fileutils package ln from the fileutils package rm from the fileutils package
as from the binutils package ld from the binutils package
cmp from the diffutils package
cc from the gcc package
egrep from the grep package grep from the grep package
make from the make package
sed from the sed package
tee from the sh-utils package
cat from the textutils package tr from the textutils package
